articles.title: Lionel Messi divides fans by 'cheating' before scoring free kick for Inter Miami, as new footage shows him mov - Daily Mail
articles.description:
A new clip of Lionel Messi cheekily adjusting the angle of a free kick before scoring has divided fans.
Messi sent Inter Miami and FC Dallas to penalties in the Leagues Cup on Sunday night.
